content: 15     such as Lehman Brothers and AIG struggled to obtain sufficient liquidity to meet their   obligations.  Liquidity is also a crucial concern in central clearing, and while regulatory reforms   have done much to strengthen both CCPs and their clearing members, we should continue to   make progress in creating a more robust and efficient system.
